title: Royal 'fab four' reunite for mental health campaign
text:
When they officially separated their working lives just months ago, royal fans feared the days of what they called the "fab four" were over forever.

Tonight, in aid of a good cause and with a little movie magic, the Dukes and Duchesses of Cambridge and Sussex will reunite for a landmark mental health campaign.

They are to star in the first coordinated television campaign to help viewers with mental health problems to "turn things around", telling an audience of millions how these health issues can happen to anyone.

Following a script by Richard Curtis, the screenwriter famous for his romantic happy endings, the four young royals will deliver a moving message for a three-minute film.
